Confidence intervals for
improvement in R-squared
are generated using
the `DeltaRSqNB()` function from the `betaNB` package.
In this example,
we use the data set and the model used in
[betaNB: Example Using the BetaNB Function](example-beta-nb.html).


``` r
library(betaNB)
```




``` r
df <- betaNB::nas1982
```

### Regression

Fit the regression model using the `lm()` function.


``` r
object <- lm(QUALITY ~ NARTIC + PCTGRT + PCTSUPP, data = df)
```

### Nonparametric Bootstrap


``` r
nb <- NB(object)
```

### Improvement in R-squared

#### Normal-Theory Approach


``` r
out <- DeltaRSqNB(nb, alpha = 0.05)
```

## Methods

### summary

Summary of the results of `DeltaRSqNB()`.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "pc")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "pc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0593 5000 0.0809 0.3140
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0484 5000 0.0358 0.2252
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0338 5000 0.0083 0.1352
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bc")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "bc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0593 5000 0.0935 0.3397
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0484 5000 0.0447 0.2445
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0338 5000 0.0107 0.1451
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bca")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "bca"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0593 5000 0.0964 0.3515
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0484 5000 0.0487 0.2624
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0338 5000 0.0095 0.1389
```

### coef

Return the vector of estimates.


``` r
coef(out)
#>    NARTIC    PCTGRT   PCTSUPP 
#> 0.1858925 0.1176542 0.0568722
```

### vcov

Return the sampling covariance matrix.


``` r
vcov(out)
#>                NARTIC        PCTGRT      PCTSUPP
#> NARTIC   0.0035195326 -0.0002754194 -0.000232711
#> PCTGRT  -0.0002754194  0.0023462309 -0.000231145
#> PCTSUPP -0.0002327110 -0.0002311450  0.001141470
```

### confint

Return confidence intervals.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "pc")
#>               2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.080873208 0.3139665
#> PCTGRT  0.035818487 0.2251998
#> PCTSUPP 0.008315327 0.1352466
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bc")
#>              2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.09346825 0.3397304
#> PCTGRT  0.04469298 0.2445305
#> PCTSUPP 0.01068968 0.1451030
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bca")
#>               2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.096369028 0.3515110
#> PCTGRT  0.048672184 0.2624014
#> PCTSUPP 0.009522437 0.1389469
```
